version_description: Added a new Automatic setting for a number of Cleaning Passes. When selected, the Roomba intelligently chooses to use two or more passes for a single small room or one pass if cleaning a larger space.

Added a new Automatic setting for a number of Cleaning Passes. When selected, the Roomba intelligently chooses to use two or more passes for a single small room or one pass if cleaning a larger space.
Bug fixes and usability improvements.
Bug fixes and usability improvements.

• This release includes an update for iRobot's end-user license agreement (EULA), privacy policy, and terms and conditions
• iRobot HOME App now supports Hebrew
• Bug fixes and usability improvements

• This release includes an update for iRobot's end-user license agreement (EULA), privacy policy, and terms and conditions
• iRobot HOME App now supports Hebrew
• Bug fixes and usability improvements

Clean Map™ Reports
•Accessible through the new History button on home screen.
•Zoom and pan Clean Map™ reports to view cleaning coverage, as well as the concentrated areas of dirt your Roomba® vacuuming robot cleaned.
•View data such as cleaning time and coverage of the most recent job, as well as lifetime area cleaned and other job averages.
•Review information for up to 30 cleaning jobs.

Push Notifications
•Receive Push Notifications when the robot completes a job or should encounter an interruption.
•Rather not receive Push Notifications? Simply turn off the feature.

Bug fixes and usability improvements
We continually make improvements to enhance your iRobot HOME App experience

Roomba® 600 and 800 Series vacuuming robot compatibility
•Now compatible with all Roomba® 690 models
•Now compatible with all Roomba® 890 models

Just speak up!
With Amazon Alexa™, you have hands‐free control to start, stop, or dock your Roomba® vacuuming robot. The Amazon Alexa™ skill is available in the United States in US English only

Bug fixes and usability improvements
We continually make improvements to enhance your iRobot HOME App experience

•Update account and password in app

•All Roomba® Wi-Fi® connected vacuuming robots are now compatible with IFTTT Applets. Trigger your Roomba® to start when you leave the house, pause cleaning when you answer the phone, and more!
•Improved support for iPad

•All Roomba® Wi-Fi® connected vacuuming robots are now compatible with IFTTT Applets. Trigger your Roomba® to start when you leave the house, pause cleaning when you answer the phone, and more!
•Improved support for iPad
Bug fixes and usability improvements

Introducing iRobot Beta!
•Your opportunity to experience and shape the experimental features we’re working on. iRobot Beta is currently available for a select number of participants
•Our first feature is the Wi-Fi® Coverage Map, which illustrates the Wi-Fi® signal strength throughout your home
Bug fixes and usability improvements

Introducing iRobot Beta!
•Your opportunity to experience and shape the experimental features we’re working on. iRobot Beta is currently available for a select number of participants
•Our first feature is the Wi-Fi® Coverage Map, which illustrates the Wi-Fi® signal strength throughout your home

Introducing new Roomba e Series and i Series compatibility!

Imprint™ Smart Mapping*
• Accessible though the Smart Maps icon on the home screen
• View a Smart Map of your home. The robot remembers the map and uses it each time it cleans, so you can:
• Clean or schedule a cleaning of specific rooms or your whole home
• Use the voice assistant of your choice to clean a room - or every room
*Compatible with new Roomba i Series only

What's New
- Improved Clean Map(TM) Reports now show where dirt was detected for Roomba 900 and i7 series robots.
- Improved workflow for customizing your Smart Map(TM) *(Roomba i7 series only).*
- New Message Center for U.S. customers
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

What's New
- Improved Clean Map(TM) Reports now show where dirt was detected for Roomba 900 and i7 series robots.
- Improved workflow for customizing your Smart Map(TM) *(Roomba i7 series only).*
- New Message Center for U.S. customers
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New and improved home screen and app design
- Ability to create and save cleaning routines with Favorites
- Ability to schedule Imprint® Link jobs
- Schedule your robot to clean when you leave the house
- Create Clean Zones to direct cleaning to objects and areas, including voice assistant support
- Improved Smart Map education
- Personalized cleaning recommendations

- Improved UI for devices with smaller screens
- Renamed our "Notifications" to "Messages"
- Fixed a delay in messages appearing in Messages
- Fixed an issue that editing your Smart Map might delete your Favorite or Schedule
- Added support of non-ascii characters when naming a Favorite
- Additional performance improvements and bug fixes
